tourBios.carHigh: 2009: Played in just two Champions Tour events. Was T49 at the U.S. Senior Open and T68 at the SAS Championship. 2008: Best effort was a T8 at the FedEx Kinko's Classic near Austin. 2007: Finished eighth at The Senior Open Championship at Muirfield.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Played in 48 events on the PGA TOUR from 1989-1993 and made 24 cuts. Fully-exempt in 1992 after placing T13 at the 1991 Q-School, the oldest player to qualify that year. Best showing on the PGA TOUR was a T16 at the 1992 Buick Open in Michigan. Also played in 88 Nationwide Tour events from 1990-98 and made 40 cuts. Finished T2 at the 1991 Hawkeye Open, two strokes back of Olin Browne. Has competed on the Sunbelt Senior Tour in recent years and has won events on that tour and was fourth on the 2009 money list. A two-time winner of the West Virginia Open in 1997 and 1999. Also won several mini-tour events in Florida on the Space Coast Tour and has worked as a club professional in his career.
tourBios.otherInfo: Was conditionally exempt on the 2010 Champions Tour by virtue of an eighth-place finish at the 2009 Champions Tour National Qualifying Tournament...Made 11 appearances in 2010, with his best performance T31s in both the 3M Championship and again at the Boeing Classic...Best career efforts on the Champions Tour were a T8 at the 2008 FedEx Kinko's Classic near Austin and solo eighth a the 2007 Senior Open Championship at Muirfield...Played in 48 events on the PGA TOUR from 1989-1993 and made 24 cuts. Fully-exempt in 1992 after placing T13 at the 1991 Q-School, the oldest player to qualify that year. Best showing on the PGA TOUR was a T16 at the 1992 Buick Open in Michigan. Also played in 88 Nationwide Tour events from 1990-98 and made 40 cuts. Finished T2 at the 1991 Hawkeye Open, two strokes back of Olin Browne. Has competed on the Sunbelt Senior Tour in recent years and has won events on that tour and was fourth on the 2009 money list. A two-time winner of the West Virginia Open in 1997 and 1999. Also won several mini-tour events in Florida on the Space Coast Tour and has worked as a club professional in his career.
tourBios.priorYearSeason: Was conditionally exempt on the 2010 Champions Tour by virtue of an eighth-place finish at the 2009 Champions Tour National Qualifying Tournament...Made 11 appearances last year and his best performance was a T31 in both the 3M Championship and again at the Boeing Classic. Open-qualified to get into the Seattle event.

dyn.dynResults: He has finished 8th on the PGA TOUR Champions 2 times.
